text: Irene Ryan (born Jessie Irene Noblitt; October 17, 1902 - April 26, 1973) was an American actress and comedian. She was born in El Paso, Texas. Ryan was known for her role as Granny, the mother-in-law of Buddy Ebsen's character, on the long-running TV series The Beverly Hillbillies (1962â€“1971). She was nominated for Emmy Awards for Outstanding Lead Actress in a Comedy Series in 1963 and 1964. Ryan died of glioblastoma and heart disease in Santa Monica, California on April 26, 1973 at the age of 70. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1902 births Category:1973 deaths Category:Deaths from glioblastoma Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American radio actors Category:Comedians from Texas Category:Actors from El Paso, Texas
title: Irene Ryan
